p: PCA of the lipid fraction of plants from different habitats showed that the samples from more arid steppe territories (Transâ€“Baikal region and Mongolia) were grouped into a single cluster on the biplot ( Figure 2) and were characterized by a high level of unsaturated fatty acids. According to the obtained results, the lipid fraction of the aerial part of B. scorzonerifolium predominantly contained MUFA and PUFA, which confirmed the pharmacological value of the species. Applying unsaturated fatty acids can alleviate the symptoms of some chronic and degenerative (cardiovascular and inflammatory) diseases [ 19].
